title: Yield Optimization with Abel Finance
description: Explore Abel Finance, a yield aggregator protocol on Aptos that automatically maximizes users' yield farming returns through optimized strategies, compounding, and cross-protocol opportunities.

tasks.title: Prepare for Yield Farming
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to explore Abel Finance's yield opportunities

tasks.title: Abel Finance Basics
tasks.description: Understand what Abel Finance offers in the Aptos ecosystem
tasks.question: What is Abel Finance's primary function?
options: Yield aggregator that optimizes DeFi returns
tasks.correctAnswer: Yield aggregator that optimizes DeFi returns

tasks.title: Yield Vaults
tasks.question: What are Yield Vaults in Abel Finance?
options: Smart contracts that automatically implement yield strategies
tasks.correctAnswer: Smart contracts that automatically implement yield strategies

tasks.title: Auto-Compounding
tasks.description: Understanding a key yield optimization technique
tasks.question: What is auto-compounding in the context of Abel Finance?
options: Automatically reinvesting earned rewards to generate compound returns
tasks.correctAnswer: Automatically reinvesting earned rewards to generate compound returns

tasks.title: Strategy Types
tasks.question: What types of yield strategies might Abel Finance employ?
options: Various strategies including LP farming, staking, lending, and more
tasks.correctAnswer: Various strategies including LP farming, staking, lending, and more

tasks.title: Yield Sources
tasks.question: What are common sources of yield in Abel Finance vaults?
options: From trading fees, token rewards, lending interest, and more
tasks.correctAnswer: From trading fees, token rewards, lending interest, and more

tasks.title: Protocol Integration
tasks.question: How does Abel Finance work with other Aptos protocols?
options: It doesn't integrate with other protocols
Only with one specific partner DEX
By building strategies that leverage multiple DeFi protocols
tasks.correctAnswer: By building strategies that leverage multiple DeFi protocols

tasks.title: Fee Structure
tasks.question: How does Abel Finance typically structure its fees?
options: Performance fee on profits and/or management fee on deposits
tasks.correctAnswer: Performance fee on profits and/or management fee on deposits

tasks.title: Risk Management
tasks.description: Learn about safety measures in Abel Finance
tasks.question: How does Abel Finance help manage risk?
options: Risk isn't managed; users are fully responsible
By offering insurance on all deposits
Through strategy diversification, code audits, and risk ratings for vaults
By only using the oldest protocols
tasks.correctAnswer: Through strategy diversification, code audits, and risk ratings for vaults

tasks.title: Governance
tasks.question: How are important protocol decisions typically made in Abel Finance?

tasks.title: Yield Comparison
tasks.question: Why might users choose Abel Finance over direct yield farming?
options: Abel offers lower yields but more stability
Abel automates compounding and strategy optimization for better net returns
tasks.correctAnswer: Abel automates compounding and strategy optimization for better net returns
